name: vimform
description:
This library provides simple text-based forms for vim. Currently supported UI elements:

    - text fields (with optional completion, tooltips, and validation)
    - check boxes

Check out further examples on:
http://github.com/tomtom/vimform_vim/tree/master/test/
http://github.com/tomtom/vimform_vim/downloads
install_details:
In order to install the vba, open the vba file in VIM and type: >

    :so %

See :help vimball for details.

Also available via git:
http://github.com/tomtom/vimform_vim

versions.release_notes:
- Canned forms
- New "widgets": singlechoice, file, dir
